unmapped.name: ONE THING Artemisia Capillaris Extract Toner150ml (8809704190008)
unmapped.description:
Aimed at allergies caused by the lack of moisture in the skin due to the environmental temperature difference.
Artemisia sphaerocephala has a cold nature, which reduces the heat in the bottom of the skin caused by sensitivity.
Helps purify the skin, remove toxins and help cleanse.
Continuous use will help improve skin tone,
Contain a variety of minerals, strengthen skin cell function,
Suitable for skin prone to redness or sensitive skin!

[Suitable for people]
Pass the skin non-irritation test, suitable for all skins!

【usage】
1. Toner
Pour an appropriate amount on the palm of your hand and pat it evenly or use cotton for a second cleaning
2. Wet compress for 3-5 minutes
Use alone or Artemisia cylindrica 50% + Houttuynia cordata 50% to improve facial redness, acne and acne
Artemisia cylindrica 50% + Centella asiatica 50% improve redness, acne and soothe fever skin
3. Mix with the cream in use
4. Pour into a spray bottle and use it as a moisturizing spray

Precautions:
1. All products are cosmetic raw materials. You may apply it on the skin directly and can also be used for manufacturing cosmetics and soap.
2. Store in a cool, dark place and away from direct sunlight.
3. Recommended to use small portions and refrigerate after subdividing them into small portions.
4. If you subdivide, please use the mist or essence bottle and refrigerate the remaining product after closing the lid well.
5. Make sure to clean and disinfect small empty bottles before the usage.
6. Please make a patch test before using it. (Although it is a natural ingredient without harmful substance, please test it safely before usage.)

The pictures are for reference only, and everything is subject to the actual product. **
Note: Since the product packaging is often limited/revisioned, if the photo is too late to be replaced, please refer to the actual product received.

unmapped.name: More than Silk™30S Trend Collection Bedding Set - Single (33034)
unmapped.description:
More than Silk™ is originated from Austrian wood fibre. With the exquisite textile and dyeing technology, it turns into extraordinary bedding accessories.
Comparing with organic cotton and mulberry silk, it is more eco-friendly and comfortable.
It contains finer fibres and higher water-content than real silk, creating an upgraded sleeping experience.
The easy caring feature of More than Silk™ let you enjoy the versatile, luxurious and very delicate silky finishing at the same time, without following the complex laundry steps, making More than Silk™ a more desirable alternative to silk.
The four corners of the fitted sheet are equipped with elastic bands which can fix the position of the fitted sheet and the mattress.
ECO® Plus quilt cover is convenient for chaning the quilts.

The picture is for reference only. The color of the product may be different due to the setting of the monitor screen, and the pattern of the product may be slightly different due to the cutting. All the actual products shall prevail.

unmapped.name: You and Oil - Beauty Shot, 100 % RESVERATROL
unmapped.description:
Resveratrol and proanthocyanidin (from grape seeds) are extra strong antioxidants able to help the skin fight free radicals and aging. The combination is also good for soothing the skin after irritation (sun, wind, cold, depilation, inflammation). For all skin types.

Usage
Pour one drop on a portion of your preferred cream, rub it between your fingers, and apply to your face. Or use it separately by rubbing it on every evening for no fewer than 14 days to notice the positive effects.

Ingredients
ACHILLEA MILLEFOLIUM FLOWER WATER, VITIS VINIFERA WINE EXTRACT, GUAR GUM, PENTYLENE GLYCOL, SODIUM BENZONATE, BENZOIC ACID

items.description:
Aimed at allergies caused by the lack of moisture in the skin due to the environmental temperature difference.
Artemisia sphaerocephala has a cold nature, which reduces the heat in the bottom of the skin caused by sensitivity.
Helps purify the skin, remove toxins and help cleanse.
Continuous use will help improve skin tone,
Contain a variety of minerals, strengthen skin cell function,
Suitable for skin prone to redness or sensitive skin!

[Suitable for people]
Pass the skin non-irritation test, suitable for all skins!

【usage】
1. Toner
Pour an appropriate amount on the palm of your hand and pat it evenly or use cotton for a second cleaning
2. Wet compress for 3-5 minutes
Use alone or Artemisia cylindrica 50% + Houttuynia cordata 50% to improve facial redness, acne and acne
Artemisia cylindrica 50% + Centella asiatica 50% improve redness, acne and soothe fever skin
3. Mix with the cream in use
4. Pour into a spray bottle and use it as a moisturizing spray

Precautions:
1. All products are cosmetic raw materials. You may apply it on the skin directly and can also be used for manufacturing cosmetics and soap.
2. Store in a cool, dark place and away from direct sunlight.
3. Recommended to use small portions and refrigerate after subdividing them into small portions.
4. If you subdivide, please use the mist or essence bottle and refrigerate the remaining product after closing the lid well.
5. Make sure to clean and disinfect small empty bottles before the usage.
6. Please make a patch test before using it. (Although it is a natural ingredient without harmful substance, please test it safely before usage.)
